title: The Shapeshifter
description: A German rocket scientist with a secret mission and dark past. A science fiction editor under the watch of the FBI. In the third chapter of Moonrise, weapons of war lay the groundwork for space travel.
dc:creator: The Washington Post
itunes:author: The Washington Post
